about_the_game:
Content Overview


Game Designer Simulator is a pixel game based on real-life themes, with a non-linear storyline and card battles. Players will take on the role of a newly graduated college student in a fictional city based on Shanghai, experiencing everything from interviews to becoming a novice Game Designer, and improving themselves under various pressures in the workplace; The ultimate dream journey to become a game producer.

Game features



·Exquisite hand drawn pixel paintings
Hand drawn pixels with full details, including vehicles, pedestrians, markets, and flying animals; With a plethora of details, you can immerse yourself in every day of the elevated Luoshandu neighborhood.


·Interactive content with rich details
It would be a pity if you can't play with such a detailed picture! Rich interactive content has been added to the scene, and the protagonist currently has over 80 action expressions, which are still being intensified!


·A non-linear narrative with intricate plot twists and turns
If anything can make this world more interesting, it must be an impressive story! Interesting dialogues, exciting performances, and every choice may change your future.

Game features

·Clever design for card battles
·Create your dream game as you please
·Recruiting partners to start businesses side by side

Follow or contact us

Bilibili/Little Red Book/Tiktok: Baililangchun
QQ group: 299701010

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo2.4ghz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

short_description: Game Designer Simulator is a pixel game based on real-life themes, with a non-linear storyline and card battles. Players will take on the role of a newly graduated college student in a fictional city based on Shanghai, experiencing everything from interviews to becoming a novice game Designer.
